thread.title: BRIEF-Veeco Instruments Q4 Earnings Per Share View $0.09

title: BRIEF-Veeco Instruments Q4 Earnings Per Share View $0.09
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Veeco Instruments Inc:
* VEECO REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.12 * Q4 ‍REVENUES OF $143.4 MILLION, COMPARED WITH $93.6 MILLION IN SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR​
* REVENUE IS EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $140 MILLION TO $165 MILLION FOR Q1 2018​
* ‍GAAP LOSS PER SHARE EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $0.50 TO LOSS PER SHARE OF $0.32 FOR Q1
* ‍Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS EXPECTED IN RANGE OF LOSS OF $0.04 PER SHARE TO PROFIT OF $0.14 PER SHARE
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.09, REVENUE VIEW $143.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
